gaffer.operation.impl.get

Class GetRelatedEdges<ELEMENT_SEED extends ElementSeed>

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GetElementsOperation<ELEMENT_SEED,CloseableIterable<Edge>>, GetIterableElementsOperation<ELEMENT_SEED,Edge>, GetIterableOperation<ELEMENT_SEED,Edge>, GetOperation<ELEMENT_SEED,CloseableIterable<Edge>>, Operation<CloseableIterable<ELEMENT_SEED>,CloseableIterable<Edge>>

    public class GetRelatedEdges<ELEMENT_SEED extends ElementSeed>
extends GetEdges<ELEMENT_SEED>
    Restricts GetEdges to match seeds that are related. This operation takes seeds of type EntitySeed and EdgeSeed.

    At a basic level RELATED is defined as:

    • An Edge is RELATED to an EntitySeed if either the Edge's source or destination matches the EntitySeed's identifier.
    • An Edge is RELATED to an EdgeSeed if the Edge's seed is equal to the EdgeSeed.

    However adjusting the includeEdge property and the incomingOutgoing property allows Edges to be filtered out.

    See Also:
    GetRelatedEdges.Builder, GetEdges
